urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text:
@Calle_Bergquist Hi @Calle_Bergquist, you can send your claim to our customer care department via this link https://t.co/cXegpq56aG
Kind regards, Mikael.

urls.title: Travel and Service Updates
urls.description: We are Scandinavian by name and nature and our operational priorities are: Safety, Punctuality and Care »

data.text:
@iamsss123456 Hi @iamsss123456, I am sorry to hear that. I can't check your booking via Twitter due to security rules, but you can read about the situation and what we can offer right now via this link https://t.co/B18JKQAZGz
Kind regards, Mikael.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text:
@iamsss123456 Hi @iamsss123456, that can be arranged via both chat and phone.
Kind regards, Mikael.

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text: @VictoriaXPalmer Hey, here can you find phone number to our baggage service  https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM and for customer service  can you find here https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj . Best Regard Phonnicha

@Blomst2040 Hey , you will receive an SMS or email from us as soon as there has been a change with your booking. In the event of a time change from SAS, you have the right to rebook  with out extra cost  or apply for a full refund. Best Regard Phonnicha

@Hrtdok Hi, for information on delayed luggage, you can contact our luggage service on telephone number +45 32323260
//Henrik

@Blomst2040 Hi, if your flight is canceled, we will try to rebook you in a comparable travel class on the first available flights with SAS, Star Alliance or other partner airlines.
//Henrik

@Fredrik_I Hi, If the country to your address is not included in the report, you need to contact the baggage service at the airport where you made the report

You will find the numbers at this link https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM

@SxHoglund Hi, if a flight is cancelled, you need to contact the travel agency you booked from for help with rebooking to other options or cancel

If the travel agency need help, they have an internal support Agent Helpdesk to contact

@iamsss123456 Hi, if a flight is canceled, you need to contact the travel agency you booked from for help with rebooking to other options
//Henrik

@Fredrik_I Hi, If you have received information that the luggage is in Copenhagen and will be sent later today, you can contact the luggage service on +45 32323260 to stop the luggage. We also recommend that you update your report with the correct address so we know where to send the bag

@Danial_ul Hi, the flight is canceled. You are notified immediately when it is confirmed, but the booking system may take a little longer before it is updated
//Henrik

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@stargirl135 Hi @stargirl135, I'm afraid we can't arrange that.
Kind regards, Mikael.

@stargirl135 Hi @stargirl135, I understand but I can't guarantee that.
Kind regards, Mikael.

urls.title: Delayed flights
urls.description: In the event of your flight being delayed, we will do our best to take care of you and keep you informed. More about what your rights are »

data.text: @spektatori Hey. As soon as there is a  schedule  change, you will receive an SMS from us. In the event of a time change from SAS,you have the right to rebook  free. For more information about you right if you flight are cancel can you find here https://t.co/gri4NRtA2z Best Regard Phonnicha

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@kirstendudley Hi @kirstendudley, I'm sorry to hear that you're having issues contacting us to resolve this. You can try to contact us via our live chat https://t.co/fxd6BsEJUx We apologize for the long waiting times right now, we're working as fast as we can.
Kind regards, Mikael.
@NaziaMukadam Hello, if your flight is affected by the strike, you will receive emails and text messages as soon as it is confirmed

@stargirl135 Hi @stargirl135, we apologize for the unusually long waiting time right now, we are doing everything we can to assist you as fast as possible so please try calling us again. 
Kind regards, Mikael.

urls.title: Travel and Service Updates
urls.description: We are Scandinavian by name and nature and our operational priorities are: Safety, Punctuality and Care »

data.text:
@rami_ramiawadh3 Hi @rami_ramiawadh3, it means that if the strike continues your flight will likely be canceled. But at the moment, we don't know and we apologize for any inconvenience. You can find more information here https://t.co/B18JKQAZGz
Kind regards, Mikael.

@dpdy2k Hi, if a flight in the booking is canceled and you choose to cancel the whole booking, you will receive full refund for all flights
//Henrik

urls.title: Manage My Bookings and Flights
urls.description: Log in with your booking reference (5-6 characters) and your last name to see all the details about your flights and manage your bookings »

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text: @Jannemiekedb Hey, I'm very sorry if your flight have been cancel. You can rebook the ticket by yourself on this link https://t.co/yZoPBVnDMr or contact our life agent on phone or chat . Here can you find information how to contact our life agent:  https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj Best Regard Phonnicha

urls.title: Canceled or Delayed Flight
urls.description: If your flight was delayed or canceled because of us, you may be entitled to compensation. If you’re entitled to compensation, we will compensate you in accordance with the EU261 regulation.

data.text:
@dwalle76 Hej, för frågor om kompensation för nya biljetter om ditt flyg blir inställt och kompensation för boendet behöver du kontakta vår Customer Care avdelning. Du skickar in ett ärende via denna länk https://t.co/oKlCwpaMq8
//Henrik

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text:
@RajalakshmiA1 Hi, you will be notified directly via email and sms when the flight is confirmed canceled. There is no exact time when this will happen
//Henrik

@krusnof Hi @krusnof, if you are stranded at your destination and have your return flight canceled with no new travel alternative offered, please call 0046 8 797 4100 for service, we will do our utmost to assist you.
Kind regards, Mikael.

urls.title: Manage My Bookings and Flights
urls.description: Log in with your booking reference (5-6 characters) and your last name to see all the details about your flights and manage your bookings »

data.text: @sayjoue Hey, Because of strikes we have today long phone and chat que to our life agent. But if you book your ticket trough SAS and you have traveling between 26jun-17jul  you can rebook free of charge to other SAS flight on this link https://t.co/yZoPBVnDMr Best Regard Phonnicha

@brealymck Hi, If your flight is canceled, we will try to rebook you in a comparable travel class on the first available flights with SAS, Star Alliance or other partner airlines without a fee.
//Henrik

@swederui Hi @swederui, we will inform you as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience.
Kind regards, Mikael.

@yashar Hi @yashar, I'm sorry to hear that. If he's stranded at his destination and has his return flight canceled with no new travel alternative offered, please call 0046 8 797 4100 for service. If he's booked via a Travel Agent, please contact them directly.
Kind regards, Mikael.

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@Venomspawn1 Hi!
I recommend you to contact us further of this refund through phone or by using our Live Chat! We will then be able to look at the rules for your ticket.
You find our contact information here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

Best regards, Angelica

@Fredrik_I Hej!
Efter att ni rapporterat er väska försvunnen, påbörjas sökandet direkt. När väskan har lokaliserats, kommer ni bli informerade angående leverans.
Rapportera er väska här: https://t.co/ojhL9dIf2x

Ni når även BagService här: https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM

Bästa hälsningar, Angelica

@thepowerofsex Hi!
I am sorry to hear that the 5 bags has not yet been found. I recommend you to contact Baggage Service to receive any further updates and information.
We have collected different numbers for each Airports here: https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM

Best Regards, Angelica

urls.title: Kontakta oss – Hitta ditt lokala telefonnummer
urls.description: Om du behöver kontakta oss hittar du lokala telefonnummer till kundservice, SAS Corporate Sales Center och SAS Group Sales här »

data.text:
@TheFamousAnders Hej!
Jag rekommenderar er att kontakta oss via telefon eller på vår Live chatt om ni har frågor angående ett avbokat flyg.
Ni finner kontaktuppgifter här: https://t.co/z4gOZAAJQJ

Bästa hälsningar, Angelica

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@dluaaap Hi!
You are able to cancel the reservation under your booking Online. You are also able to call or Live Chat with us to receive further assistance regarding this refund of your cancelled flight!
You find our contact info here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

Best regards, Angelica

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

urls.title: Customer Claims
urls.description: If you’re filing a claim due to an unfortunate experience with us, you may be entitled to compensation.

data.text:
@ZasLoka Hi!
In order to request a compensation for the new flight you bought, you will need to contact Customer Care.
You reach them through this link: https://t.co/xMt9zSrqJc 
Customer Care will then look at your case and get back to you by email!

Best Regards, Angelica

@BigFoxxo Hi!
I am sorry to hear that the bags has not yet been received. I recommend you to contact Baggage service to check for any updates regarding this delivery! 
We have collected all of our different numbers for each Airports here: https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM

Best regards, Angelica

@Juhniece7 Hi!
I am sorry to hear that your luggage has not yet been found!
My recommendation for you is to contact Baggage Service further of this to check for any updates. All of the different numbers are collected through this link: https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM

Best Regards, Angelica

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@forhelvede2022 Hej!
Vi rekommenderar er att kontakta oss vidare angående er bokning på telefon eller via vår Live Chatt för att se över alternativ.
Ni finner våra kontaktuppgifter via denna länk: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

Bästa hälsningar, Angelica

urls.title: Flysas.com - Scandinavian Airlines Official Website
urls.description: Welcome to Scandinavian Airlines Official Website. Select your country/language, your preferred currency, and book your next flight among +130 destinations

data.text:
@xunqingdao Hi, I am sorry but we can't arrange that from here. it is handled by the arrival service at the airport where you landed and reported your delayed baggage. You need to contact them for more assistance: https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2
Kind regards, Mikael.

urls.title: Canceled or Delayed Flight
urls.description: If your flight was delayed or canceled because of us, you may be entitled to compensation. If you’re entitled to compensation, we will compensate you in accordance with the EU261 regulation.

@tboons Hi @tboons, please use this form online to submit your claim https://t.co/oKlCwpaMq8
Kind regards, Mikael.

data.text: @ClaraReynesCapo Hi Clara, I'm so sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. I'd advice you to contact us via phone or through our live chat at: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj for rebooking assistance. Kind regards, Rebecca

@sarah86371623 Hi, I am sorry to hear your bag has still not been delivered. I'd advice you to call baggage service here: https://t.co/ZV9bTO42dA
Kind regards, Rebecca

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text: @Fondacey Hi, we are not able to merge bookings. However, if you contact us via phone or through our live chat at: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj we can make a remark in your respective bookings that you are travelling together. Kind regards, Rebecca

data.text: @EtoileBrilliant Hi, I'd advice you to remove your tweet since your booking reference is personal information. If you still need help, please contact us through phone or via our live chat on: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj Kind regards, Rebecca

domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text:
@dmnicholson Hi @dmnicholson, of course! It's +46 771 22 42 43. I'm afraid I don't know why it hasn't been updated and I apologize for any inconvenience.
Kind regards, Mikael.

@scottsdalesanj Hi @scottsdalesanj, many airports in Europe report major baggage delivery delays due to shortage of staff this summer.  This unfortunately also affects SAS customers. You can contact the baggage service to check if they have more info: https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2
Kind regards, Mikael

@Kevster2121 Hi @Kevster2121, I'm glad to hear that. Have a nice flight!
Kind regards, Mikael.

@dmnicholson Hi @dmnicholson, you contact the airport that was the final destination of that trip. So not the airport where your bag was checked in and not a transfer airport, as an example.
Kind regards, Mikael.

Kind regards, Mikael.

data.text:
@travelorbust79 Hi,
The cancellation can occur on short notice, you can always check your flight status here: https://t.co/sm87IXHDkD and if your flight is affected you will be informed as soon as possible.
Best regards,
Stina
